about_the_game:
Fresh from the overactive imagination of an insane artist, locked in a dungeon and handcuffed to a computer comes……..

Bug Splatt

Splatt your way through TEN splattery bug busting levels, bashing as many bugs as you can before the timer runs out…..


  • Test your skills and speed against a variety of creepy crawlies!
  • Wonder at the amount of ooze that comes out of the bugs…
  • Race against the clock to see how many bugs you can bash..
  • Take a screenshot and share your gore with your friends! (Android version only)
  • Gross out your friends and family with some disgusting bug carnage!

*Not recommended for entomologists or the squeamish!
detailed_description:
New Update Aug2018

New update 2.2, some bug fixes (duoh!) some improvements to game play and added Chinese language support for all titles, UI and intros. Week of 27thAug until 3 Sept will be 50% off! Grab a bargain now!


New Major Update!

New major Update just applied to Bug Splatt. Four new bug busting levels added and two new and devious weapons.
Not only that....once you complete all levels, four selectable weapons are at your disposal! Happy bug busting.

name: Bug Splatt

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Win 7, 8, 10 x86 (32 bit)
  • Processor: i5
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: on board basic graphics
  • Storage: 240 MB available space
  • Sound Card: on board sound
  • Additional Notes: Designed to run on Android, so should run on most basic PC's
